ygData.subject: Katta Castellum songs -- Amplification questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Finally made the run to Katta to get my new songs.  I got them all even though some (magical monologue, sustaining song) seem completely useless to me at this
ygData.messageBody:
Finally made the run to Katta to get my new songs. I got them all even
though some (magical monologue, sustaining song) seem completely useless to
me at this level.

Amplification, wow.

Anyone change up their lineup to make this song more useful?

Also, I've heard now that chorus of clarity and Soothing stack...

And that if you restart crack a bunch of times it stacks on itself?

Any comments? Any experience?

What are your favorite haste/melee buff songs and do any of them work with
amplification?

Very curious to hear wht ya'll have to say.

Raub Zaumbie
42nd Lvl E. Marr Server
